name: Tasly Cordyceps Capsule
description: Premium cordyceps sinensis capsules for enhanced vitality, immune support, and overall wellness. Supports respiratory health and energy levels.
longDescription: Tasly Cordyceps Capsule is a premium health supplement made from high-quality Cordyceps Sinensis mycelium. This powerful traditional Chinese medicine ingredient is known for its ability to boost energy, enhance immune function, support respiratory health, and improve overall vitality. Each capsule contains concentrated cordyceps extract standardized for maximum potency and effectiveness.

name: Tasly Danshen Plus
description: Advanced cardiovascular support formula with Danshen (Salvia) root extract. Promotes healthy blood circulation and heart function.
longDescription: Tasly Danshen Plus is a scientifically formulated cardiovascular health supplement featuring premium Danshen (Salvia miltiorrhiza) root extract combined with modern biotechnology. This powerful formula supports heart health, promotes healthy blood circulation, helps maintain normal blood pressure levels, and protects cardiovascular function. Ideal for those looking to maintain optimal heart health naturally.

name: Tasly Propolis Syrup
description: Natural bee propolis syrup for immune support, throat health, and antioxidant protection. Great for the whole family.
longDescription: Tasly Propolis Syrup is a delicious and effective natural health supplement made from premium bee propolis extract. Rich in flavonoids and natural antibiotics, this syrup provides powerful immune support, soothes throat irritation, fights bacteria and viruses, and delivers potent antioxidant protection. Perfect for maintaining health during cold and flu season or as a daily wellness supplement for the entire family.

name: Tasly Ginseng Royal Jelly
description: Premium blend of ginseng and royal jelly for energy, vitality, and anti-aging benefits. Enhances physical and mental performance.
longDescription: Tasly Ginseng Royal Jelly combines the powerful benefits of premium Korean ginseng extract with nutrient-rich royal jelly from bee colonies. This exceptional formula provides sustained energy, enhances mental clarity and focus, supports anti-aging processes, boosts stamina and endurance, and promotes overall vitality. Ideal for busy professionals, athletes, and anyone seeking natural energy and wellness support.

name: Tasly Gynostemma Tea
description: Herbal tea made from premium Gynostemma pentaphyllum (Jiaogulan). Supports metabolism, immunity, and healthy aging.
longDescription: Tasly Gynostemma Tea is crafted from the finest Gynostemma pentaphyllum leaves, also known as 'Jiaogulan' or the 'Immortality Herb' in traditional Chinese medicine. This remarkable herbal tea is rich in gypenosides (similar to ginseng), supports healthy metabolism, strengthens the immune system, promotes cardiovascular health, and provides powerful antioxidant protection. Enjoy daily as a refreshing wellness beverage.

name: Tasly Micardis
description: Advanced cardiovascular and microcirculation support formula. Helps maintain healthy blood flow and vessel function.
longDescription: Tasly Micardis is a specialized cardiovascular supplement designed to support microcirculation and overall vascular health. This advanced formula helps maintain healthy blood flow to vital organs, supports capillary function, promotes cardiovascular wellness, and helps protect against oxidative stress in blood vessels. Particularly beneficial for those concerned with circulation and vascular health.

name: Tasly Ganoderma Capsule
description: Premium Reishi mushroom (Ganoderma lucidum) capsules for immune support, stress relief, and longevity.
longDescription: Tasly Ganoderma Capsule features premium Reishi mushroom (Ganoderma lucidum) extract, revered in traditional Chinese medicine as the 'Mushroom of Immortality.' Rich in polysaccharides and triterpenes, this powerful supplement supports immune function, helps manage stress and promote relaxation, supports liver health, and provides adaptogenic benefits for overall wellness and longevity.

name: Tasly Digest Natural
description: Natural digestive support formula with herbs and enzymes. Promotes healthy digestion and gut comfort.
longDescription: Tasly Digest Natural is a comprehensive digestive health supplement combining traditional herbs with modern enzyme science. This gentle yet effective formula supports healthy digestion, relieves occasional bloating and discomfort, promotes regular bowel movements, and helps maintain optimal gut health. Perfect for daily digestive wellness and comfort.

name: Tasly Antilipemic Tea
description: Herbal tea blend formulated to support healthy cholesterol levels and cardiovascular wellness.
longDescription: Tasly Antilipemic Tea is a specially formulated herbal blend designed to support healthy lipid metabolism and cardiovascular function. This therapeutic tea helps maintain healthy cholesterol levels, supports fat metabolism, promotes cardiovascular wellness, and provides gentle detoxification. Enjoy 2-3 cups daily as part of a heart-healthy lifestyle.

name: Tasly IceBerry Pearl Powder
description: Premium pearl powder with berry extracts for skin health, beauty, and anti-aging from within.
longDescription: Tasly IceBerry Pearl Powder is a luxurious beauty supplement combining pure pearl powder with antioxidant-rich berry extracts. This unique formula supports skin health and radiance, provides anti-aging benefits, promotes collagen production, and delivers essential minerals and amino acids. Perfect for those seeking natural beauty enhancement from within.

name: Tasly Epimedium Capsule
description: Traditional herbal supplement for vitality, energy, and reproductive health support.
longDescription: Tasly Epimedium Capsule features premium Epimedium (Horny Goat Weed) extract, a time-honored herb in traditional Chinese medicine. This potent supplement supports vitality and energy, promotes healthy reproductive function, enhances stamina and endurance, and supports bone health. Ideal for maintaining overall wellness and vigor.

name: Tasly Chitosan Capsule
description: Natural fiber supplement from marine sources for weight management and cholesterol support.
longDescription: Tasly Chitosan Capsule is a premium dietary fiber supplement derived from natural marine sources. Rich in chitosan, a powerful natural fiber, this supplement supports healthy weight management by binding dietary fats, helps maintain healthy cholesterol levels, promotes digestive health, and supports detoxification. Perfect complement to a balanced diet and exercise program.

name: Tasly Calcium Tablets
description: High-absorption calcium supplement with vitamin D for strong bones and teeth.
longDescription: Tasly Calcium Tablets provide highly bioavailable calcium combined with vitamin D3 for optimal absorption and bone health support. This essential supplement helps maintain strong bones and teeth, supports muscle function, promotes cardiovascular health, and is particularly important for women, seniors, and growing children. Easy-to-swallow tablets for daily bone health maintenance.

name: Tasly Grape Seed Extract
description: Powerful antioxidant supplement from premium grape seeds for skin, heart, and overall health.
longDescription: Tasly Grape Seed Extract delivers concentrated proanthocyanidins (OPCs), some of nature's most powerful antioxidants. This premium supplement supports cardiovascular health, promotes healthy, youthful skin, provides potent antioxidant protection, and supports healthy circulation. Ideal for comprehensive wellness and anti-aging support.

name: Tasly Deep Sea Fish Oil
description: Premium Omega-3 fish oil for heart, brain, and joint health. High EPA and DHA content.
longDescription: Tasly Deep Sea Fish Oil provides ultra-pure Omega-3 fatty acids (EPA and DHA) from deep sea fish in convenient softgel form. This premium supplement supports cardiovascular health, promotes brain function and mental clarity, supports joint health and flexibility, and provides anti-inflammatory benefits. Molecularly distilled for purity and potency, free from heavy metals and contaminants.
